trans-unit.source: mech init can be used to pull a box file which will be installed and generate a Mechfile in the current directory. You can also pull boxes from Vagrant Cloud with mech init freebsd/FreeBSD-11.1-RELEASE. See the mech up -h page for more information.
trans-unit.target: mech init 可用于提取将要安装的box文件并在当前目录中生成Mechfile。您也可以使用 mech init freebsd/FreeBSD-11.1-RELEASE 从Vagrant Cloud中拉箱子。有关更多信息，请参见 mech up -h 页面。

trans-unit.source: Newly added mech cloud capability. See mech cloud --help for more info. Ever want to start a VM on another desktop/laptop? With 'mech cloud' you can do just that. 'mech cloud' is similar to the the docker context option. (Note: 'mech cloud' was written before discovering 'docker context', otherwise would have borrowed some of docker's interface/terms.)
trans-unit.target: 新增的 mech cloud 功能。有关更多信息，请参见 mech cloud --help 。是否曾经想过在另一个台式机/笔记本电脑上启动VM？借助“机云”，您可以做到这一点。“机械云”类似于docker context选项。（注意：“机云”是在发现“码头工人上下文”之前编写的，否则会借用一些码头工人的界面/术语。）

trans-unit.source: Newly added virtualbox functionality. By default, the provider will be vmware. Tested on Ubuntu (using VMware Workstation and VirtualBox) and Mac (using VirtualBox and VMware Fusion).
trans-unit.target: 新增的virtualbox功能。默认情况下，提供程序将为 vmware 。在Ubuntu（使用VMware Workstation和VirtualBox）和Mac（使用VirtualBox和VMware Fusion）上进行了测试。

trans-unit.source: All "state" will be saved in .mech directory. (boxes and instances)
trans-unit.target: 所有的 "状态 "将保存在.mech目录下。(盒子和实例)

trans-unit.source: Background
trans-unit.target: 背景资料

trans-unit.source: Can have multiple instances of the same box. The default instance name is 'first'.
trans-unit.target: 可以拥有同一个盒子的多个实例。默认的实例名是'first'。

trans-unit.source: Copy script to path above
trans-unit.target: 复制脚本到上面的路径

trans-unit.source: Copy script to something in fpath (Note: Run echo $fpath to show value.)
trans-unit.target: 将脚本复制到fpath中的某个内容（注意：运行 echo $fpath 以显示值。）

trans-unit.source: Did you know you can now provision using pyinfra? See mech provision --help for more info or look at one of the integration tests for how to specify pyinfra provisioning from a remote file. You can also have local files for provisioning.
trans-unit.target: 你知道吗，现在你可以规定使用 pyinfra ？有关更多信息，请参见 mech provision --help 或查看集成测试之一，以了解如何从远程文件指定 pyinfra Provisioning。您还可以使用本地文件进行配置。

trans-unit.source: Example using mech
trans-unit.target: 使用机甲的例子

trans-unit.source: Examples:
trans-unit.target: 例如:

trans-unit.source: For help on any individual command run mech <command> -h
trans-unit.target: 对于任何单个命令的帮助，请运行 mech <command> -h

trans-unit.target: 这里是添加新实例的帮助信息。

trans-unit.source: Here is what it would look like having multiple instance with different providers:
trans-unit.target: 以下是拥有多个实例与不同提供商的情况。

trans-unit.source: If having a problem with a command, add the "--debug" option like this:
trans-unit.target: 如果某个命令有问题,可以添加"--debug "选项,像这样。

trans-unit.source: If the box you init was created properly, you will be able to access the host's current working directory in /mnt/hgfs/mech. If you are having trouble with an Ubuntu guest, try running:
trans-unit.target: 如果您正确创建了init框，则可以访问 /mnt/hgfs/mech 中主机的当前工作目录。如果您在使用Ubuntu guest虚拟机时遇到问题，请尝试运行：

trans-unit.source: Initializing and using a box from HashiCorp's Vagrant Cloud:
trans-unit.target: 初始化和使用HashiCorp的Vagrant Cloud的盒子。

trans-unit.source: Initializing and using a machine from HashiCorp's Vagrant Cloud:
trans-unit.target: 初始化和使用HashiCorp的Vagrant Cloud的机器。

trans-unit.source: Installation
trans-unit.target: 安装

trans-unit.source: One of the authors made this because they don't like VirtualBox and wanted to use vagrant with VMmare Fusion but was too cheap to buy the Vagrant plugin.
trans-unit.target: 其中一位作者是因为不喜欢VirtualBox,想用vagrant和VMmare Fusion一起使用,但又嫌买Vagrant插件太便宜。

trans-unit.source: Please test and provide any feedback/issues.
trans-unit.target: 请测试并提供任何反馈/问题。

trans-unit.source: Reload .bash_profile
trans-unit.target: 重新加载.bash_profile

trans-unit.source: Reload zsh
trans-unit.target: 重新加载zsh

trans-unit.source: Shared Folders
trans-unit.target: 共享文件夹

trans-unit.source: There is --help on every operation.
trans-unit.target: 每个操作都有 --help 。

trans-unit.source: To install:
trans-unit.target: 要安装:

trans-unit.source: Tool for command line virtual machines
trans-unit.target: 用于命令行虚拟机的工具

trans-unit.source: Try it out by typing mech <tab>. It should show the options available.
trans-unit.target: 输入 mech <tab> 进行尝试。它应该显示可用的选项。

trans-unit.source: Want bash completion for commands/options (aka "tab completion")?
trans-unit.target: 想用bash完成命令/选项(也就是 "标签完成")?

trans-unit.source: Want zsh completion for commands/options (aka "tab completion")?
trans-unit.target: 想用zsh完成命令/选项(也就是 "标签完成")?

trans-unit.source: add these lines to ~/.bash_profile
trans-unit.target: 在 ~/.bash_profile 中添加以下几行内容。

trans-unit.target: 在 ~/.zshrc 中添加以下几行内容。

trans-unit.target: 其次

trans-unit.target: mech add --help
